Title: Pure Evil
Text: Play a card from the Villain Deck. Keep this card in the Ambition Row.|(This card starts the game in the Ambition Row and cannot be discarded from the Ambition Row. You can use this card multiple times in the same turn.)

Title: Crackdown
Text: Choose a class. Each other player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that class.

Title: Tide of Destruction
Text: Play two cards from the Villain Deck.

Title: Abduction
Text: Put a Hero from the HQ on the bottom of the Hero Deck.

Title: Secret Plans
Text: Put this card under a Villain in the Sewers or Bank. When that Villain escapes, this card becomes a Scheme Twist that takes effect immediately. If that Villain leaves the city another way, discard this.

Title: Wipe Out
Text: Choose a class. Put all heroes of that class from the HQ on the bottom of the Hero Deck.

Title: Crush the Weak
Text: The other player with the fewest Villains in their Victory Pile gains a Wound. (You choose how to break a tie.)

Title: Identity Theft
Text: Each other player that has exactly six cards reveals a Tech Hero or puts two cards from their hand on top of their deck.

Title: Wave of Punishment
Text: Each other player reveals a Ranged Hero or gains a Wound to the bottom of their deck.

Title: Force Field
Text: Put this card under the Mastermind card. That Mastermind gets +3 Attack until the start of your next turn. Then, discard this card.

Title: Breakout
Text: Choose a Villain from the Escape Pile. It enters the city.

Title: Last-Minute Escape
Text: Pick a random Mastermind Tactic from all the ones in players' Victory Piles. Shuffle it back into the Mastermind's Tactics.

Title: Empower
Text: Put this card under a Villain in the city. Until the start of your next turn, that Villain gets +3 Attack. Then, discard this card.

Title: Deceive
Text: Each other player reveals a Covert Hero or discards their hand and draws five cards.

Title: Inflict Pain
Text: Each other player puts a Wound from their discard pile on top of their deck.

Title: Bank Robbery
Text: KO the Hero in the HQ space under the Bank. You get + Recruit equal to that Hero's printed Recruit.

Title: Pressure Point
Text: Each other player reveals a Instinct Hero or gains a Wound to the top of their deck.

Title: Cleave
Text: Choose a number besides 0. Each other player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that cost.

Title: Entrap
Text: Put this card on a Hero in the HQ. Players can't recruit that Hero until the start of your next turn. Then, discard this card.

Title: Insane Twist
Text: This card becomes a Scheme Twist that takes effect immediately.

Title: Kidnap
Text: A Villain in the city captures a Bystander.

Title: Thirst for Power
Text: Reveal the top two cards of the Villain Deck. Play a Scheme Twist you revealed. Put the rest back on the top and/or bottom in any order.

Title: Painful Choice
Text: Each other player chooses Recruit or Attack, then discard all their cards with that icon.

Title: Crime Surge
Text: Each Villain on the Rooftops and Streets captures a Bystander.

Title: Dark Apprentice
Text: Add a random new Mastermind to the game with one Tactic.

Title: Collateral Damage
Text: Each other player KOs a Bystander from their Victory Pile or gains a Wound.

Title: Ruthless Strike
Text: This card becomes a Master Strike that takes effect immediately.

Title: Infiltrate S.H.I.E.L.D.
Text: Choose a 0-cost Hero from the KO pile for each other player. Those players gain those Heroes.

Title: Thirst for Vengeance
Text: Reveal the top two cards of the Villain Deck. Play a Master Strike you revealed. Put the rest back on the top and/or bottom in any order.

Title: Pummel
Text: Each other player reveals a Strength Hero or gains a Wound.

Title: Puzzle Trap
Text: Choose a class. Other players can't recruit heroes of that class until the start of your next turn. Then, discard this card.

Title: Seize the High Ground
Text: Patrol the Rooftops: If there's a Villain there, then all Villains everywhere get +1 Attack until the start of your next turn.|Then, discard this card.

Title: Hostage Situation
Text: Patrol the Streets: If there's a Villain there, then each Villain in the city captures a Bystander.

Title: This is a Stickup
Text: Patrol the Bank: If there's a Villain there, each other player reveals their hand and discards a card with a Recruit icon.

Title: Shadowy Disciple
Text: This ambition ascends to become a new 9 Attack Mastermind worth 5 VP. It gains the ability: "Master Strike: Each player reveals a Ranged Hero or gains a Wound.

Title: Detonate the Bridge
Text: Patrol the Bridge: If there's a Villain there, each player gains a Wound.

Title: Short Escape Tunnels
Text: Patrol the Sewers: If there's a Villain there, it escapes.

Title: Crazed Charge
Text: A Villain in the city charges two spaces.

Title: Devastate S.H.I.E.L.D.
Text: Every other player reveals their hand and discards all their cards that cost 0.

Title: Rack and Ruin
Text: This card becomes a Master Strike that takes effect immediately. Then, this card becomes a Scheme Twist that takes effect immediately.
